name: Grilled+Beef+Steak+Meal
title: Grilled Beef Steak Meal
description: A grilled beef steak meal which is usually served with fries or a salad for garnish as well as sauces of choice.
ingredients: Onions, Garlic, Olive Oil, Vinegar, Soy Sauce, Rosemary, Mustard, Salt, Pepper, Grilled Beef Meat

name: Grilled+Pork+Steak+Meal
title: Grilled Pork Steak Meal
description: A grilled pork steak meal which is usually served with fries or a salad for garnish as well as sauce of choice.
ingredients: Light Soy Sauce, Vegetable Oil, Lemon Pepper Seasoning, Minced Garlic, Boneless Loin Chops

name: Chicken+Souvlaki+Meal
title: Chicken Souvlaki Meal
description: Grilled chicken souvlaki meal served in a pitta or on a plate. With additional fries or salad and sauces of choice.
ingredients: Olive Oil, Lemon Juice, Minced Garlic Cloves, Dried Oregano, Salt, Boneless Chicken Breast Halves, Greek Yogurt, Cucumber, White Vinegar

name: Pepperoni+Pizza
title: Pepperoni Pizza
description: The classical and well known Pepperoni Pizza served casually with drink of choice.
ingredients: Pepperoni, tomato sauce, parmesan cheese, olive oil, italian seasoning, cornmeal, onions..

name: Margarita+Pizza
title: Margarita Pizza
description: Margarita Pizza served casually with drink of choice.
ingredients: Olive Oil, Roasted Garlic, Tomato Sauce, Mozarella Cheese, Basil, Ground Pepper

name: Fried+Chicken+Salad
title: Fried Chicken Salad
description: This salad consists of fried chicken strips with fresh tomatoes and a tartar sauce for dressing.
ingredients: Mayonnaise, Buttermilk, Whole-Grain Mustard, Dried Italian Seasoning, Cayenne, Lemon Juice, Fried Chicken Pieces, Parsley, Green Onions, Black Pepper

name: Salmon+Fillet+Meal
title: Salmon Fillet Meal
description: This dish consists of perfectly steam coocked salmon fillets served along with a tomato sauce and broccoli for garnish.
ingredients: Skinless Salmon Fillet, Black Pepper, Olive Oil, Garlic Cloves, Lemon Juice, Butter, Honey, Parsley

name: Lamb+Chops+Meal
title: Lamb Chops Meal
description: Lamb Chops served with green beans and small decorative patatoes for garnish.
ingredients: Crushed Garlic Cloves, Rosemary Leaves, Thyme Leaves, Cayenne Pepper, Sea Salt, Olive Oil, Lamb Chops

name: Pork+Souvlaki+Meal
title: Pork Souvlaki Meal
description: Grilled pork souvlaki meal served in a pitta or on a plate. With additional fries or salad for garnish and sauces of choice.
ingredients: Boneless Pork Loin, Lemon Juice, Olive Oil, Garlic Cloves, Dried Oregano, Salt, Pepper, Tzatziki, Greek pita breads

name: Italian+Chicken+Wrap+Meal
title: Italian Chicken Wrap Meal
description: Italian chicken wrap meal consisting of stir fry vegetable blend, grilled chicken, italian sauce dressing and parmesan cheese served with fries or a salad for garnish based on choice.
ingredients: Stir Fry Vegetables, Grilled Chicken Strips, Italian Salad Dressing, Parmesan Cheese, Tortillas

name: Spaghetti+With+Meat+Balls+Meal
title: Spaghetti With Meat Balls Meal
description: Spaghetti meat balls meal served with grinded mozzarella cheese on top and coliander leaves along with tomato sauce.
ingredients: Ground Beef, Bread Crumbs, Parsley, Parmesan, Black Pepper, Garlic Powder, Eggs(s), Tomato Sauce, Olive Oil

name: Terriyaki+Chicken+Pizza
title: Terriyaki Chicken Pizza
description: Terriyaki Chicken Pizza consists of terriyaki sauce, chicken, bacon and mozzarella cheese.
ingredients: Prebaked Pizza Crust, Teriyaki Sauce, Chopped Chicken pieces, Cooked Crumbled Bacon, Mozzarella Cheese

name: Chinese+Sesame+Chicken+Meal
title: Chinese Sesame Chicken Meal
description: Chinese sesame chicken meal with perfectly cooked chicken pieces covered in sweet and sour sauce and sesame. Served with rice and green vegetables for garnish.
ingredients: Soy Sauce, Cornstarch, Dry Sherry, Vegetable Oil, Sesame Oil, Chicken Breast Meat, Chicken Broth, White Vinegar, Chile Paste, Minced Garlic, Olive Oil

name: Shrimp+Scambi+Pasta+Meal
title: Shrimp Scambi Pasta Meal
description: This unique dish combines pasta and shrimp in a significant way with a mixture of cheese and coliander.
ingredients: Olive Oil, Peeled Shrimps, Garlic Cloves, Dried Hot Red-Pepper Flakes, White Wine, Salt, Black Pepper, Butter, Capellini, Parsley

name: Spinache+and+Mozzarella+Pasta+Meal
title: Spinach and Mozzarella Pasta Meal
description: A classic pasta dish that combines spinach and mozzarella in a perfect way.
ingredients: Olive Oil, Onions, Garlic, Thyme, Pasta, Tomatoes, Mozzarella, Spinach, Salt, Pepper

name: Spaghetti+with+Smokey+Tomato+Sauce+and+Seafood
title: Spaghetti with Smokey Tomato Sauce and Seafood
description: Classical Spaghetti dish that consists of a smoked tomato sauce on top and a mixture of seafood.
ingredients: Garlic Cloves, Pasta, Olive Oil, Peeled Shrimps, Mussels, Baby Squids, Tomato Sauce
